meta.description: Maximize the flow of supplies from the source hub to the destination hub in a transportation network.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Key hub cities in the transportation network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each route between cities in tons.

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source to destination.

objective.name: maximize_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow of supplies from City 0 to City 8.

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Net flow from the source city 0.

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Net flow into the destination city 8.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 1.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 2.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 3.

constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 4.

constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 5.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 6.

constraints.name: flow_conservation_7
constraints.description: Flow conservation at city 7.
